Help for young mums
If you are a young mum, there 
are a wide range of services 
to support you when you are 
pregnant and after you have 
had your baby. Your midwife or 
health visitor will be able to give 
you details of local services.
If you are on your own 
If you are pregnant and on 
your own, it is even more 
important that there are 
people with whom you can 
share your feelings an
